mapper.select: select c.id, c.user_auth_id, c.topic_type, c.topic_id, c.content, c.ip_address, c.ip_source, c.point, c.location, c.device, c.browser, c.root_id, c.parent_id, c.type, c.nickname, c.email, c.qq, c.hidden, c.review, c.create_time, c.update_time, c.deleted, info.nickname as infoName, info.avatar as infoAvatar, info.email as infoEmail, info.website as infoWebsite, info.introduction as introduction, r.id as roleId, r.name as roleName from t_comment as c left join t_user_auth auth on c.user_auth_id = auth.id left join t_user_info info on auth.user_info_id = info.id left join t_user_role ur on auth.id = ur.user_auth_id left join t_role r on r.id = ur.role_id where c.deleted = 0 and c.hidden = 0 and c.id = #{id}
